description:
When focused on building the greatest snow fort the world (or at least your block) has ever seen, your little winter adventurer doesn’t need to be distracted by cold feet. Equipped with multiple layers of weather protection the Luke boots will keep little feet toasty on winter’s worst days. With their easy pull lacing, these boots are easy to get into and out of, even with gloved or mittened hands.

  • Waterproof nylon upper is fully seam-sealed to keep feet dry
  • Kamik’s lightweight synthetic RubberHe is PVC-free, waterproof, durable and recyclable
  • RubberHe is rated to 1,000,000 flexes and is unaffected by weather down to -32°C, offering excellent traction in any weather
  • Nite Rays reflective accents help keep your little one seen in low light conditions
  • Thick fleece collar holds the warmth in and keeps powdery snow out
  • Fixed foam and fleece insulation
  • IceWave sole with multidirectional lugs offers great grip in slippy winter conditions
  • Kamik rates these boots down to -40°C
name: Kamik Luke 4 Winter Boots - Children to Youths
